name: Vampyr
description: London, 1918. You are newly-turned Vampyr Dr. Jonathan Reid. As a doctor, you must find a cure to save the cityâ€™s flu-ravaged citizens. As a Vampyr, you are cursed to feed on those you vowed to heal.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i3-2130 (3.4 GHz)/AMD FX-4100 (3.6 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 1050 (Legacy GPU: GeForce GTX 660) / Radeon R7 370 Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i7-3930K (3.2 GHz)/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (3.2 GHz) Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GeForce GTX 970 / GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 390 Storage: 20 GB available space
